name: Cousin Eddie
description:
Our tribute to the best and funniest xmas movie ever created. 

Merry Christmas! Shitter was full!

Hand printed on heather grey American Apparel Tees.

name: Power Pack 3
description:
The POWER PACKS are BACK! And this time they are jam-packed with more rad crap than you can shake a stick at! Each pack contains stickers, a patch and some random 80's awesomeness that makes every pack completely unique!

CONTENTS:
•  5 8BZ GPK stickers
•  1 Thrashor Sticker
•  1 Noxious Sticker
•  1 Zombicon sticker
•  1 Embroidered Zombicon patch w/iron-on backing
•  2 Random 8BZ buttons
•  1 Random 80's Card Wax Pack
•  1 Random 80's toy (Micro Machine, MUSCLE Man, or Mad Monster Head!)

name: Garbage Bag
description:
A super gross tribute to those trashy tikes from the 80's.

This putrid pack includes the following:

4 GPK inspired sticker cards
1 "Make Your Own" GPK ticker set (2 JUMBO sheets)
1 8BZ trash can sticker
1 8BZ garbage pail pin
1 Random 8BZ GPK card poster. 11" x 15.4" (Folded to fit in bag)
(Posters can be purchased unfolded and as a set while supplies last!)

name: Stocking Stuffer Pack
description:
Stocking Stuffer Double Pack!

For a limited time only, get a GARBAGE BAG and a POWER PACK together and save some dough in the process! The perfect stocking stuffers for any 80's kid!

(See individual product pages for detailed descriptions and contents)

name: Loners & Rebels
description:
"I'm a loner Dottie, a rebel."

Hand printed on American Apparel tees.

name: Loners Hoodie
description:
"I'm a loner Dottie, a rebel."

- American Apparel sleeveless hoodies.

- Features an embroidered patch on the front and a print on the back.

name: Loners Patch
description:
Proudly proclaim your loner and rebel status with this rad embroidered patch.

- 3.5 inches
- Iron-on backing

name: Wyld Stallyns
description:
MOST TRIUMPHANT!!!

This Bill & Ted tribute hat features a most excellent Wyld Stallyns logo on the front. The brim features none other than Bill S. Preston Esquire and Ted Theodore Logan.

Stick this hat on your head, shred some air guitar and prepare for some excellent adventures!
 

Non-non-NON-heinous!!!

name: Enforcer
description:
SERVE THE PUBLIC TRUST, PROTECT THE INNOCENT, UPHOLD THE LAW.

This hat features your favorite cyborg policeman on the brim and an embroidered OCP badge patch on the front. Robodacious!

name: Gizmo
description: The original Gizmo hat is back! Give this cute little fella a good home on top of your head. Just make sure you follow these three all important rules: Stay out of bright light, don't get it wet and certainly don't feed it after midnight!

name: THRASHOR TOY
description:
GONE BUT NOT FOR LONG!


Check back soon! An army of Thrashor figures will be marching back into the store in the coming weeks!


 --------------------------------------------------------------- *PLEASE NOTE* - These figure are PRE-ORDER items and will ship out in approx. 2 weeks. Any other items ordered with these figures will ship out separately/first. An 8BZ dream has finally come true. We proudly present to you the first 8-bit ZOMBIE toy! Based on last summer's epic tee design, we've brought THRASHOR to life and given him 3 dimensions of pure slime-green radness. This "first run" of Thrashor figures is limited to 50 so don't miss out! -Thrashor is 5.5 inches tall and will fit right in with your MOTU collection. -Made of slime green resin. -Includes Thrashor's prized skateboard for maximum THRASHIN'! -Each of these limited "First Run" figures will be hand numbered from 1 to 50. -Package includes an assortment of stickers.

name: Body Bag
description: The Body Bag Series 1 is here! What better way to kick things off than with a classic Halloween style decoration? And of course we couldn't resist giving it a radically-retro 8BZ twist. - Decoration is 53 inches tall! - Jointed and pose-able! - Includes a Body Bag mini sticker sheet! PLEASE NOTE: These decorations are BIG. Even folded up and in their bag, they require a huge mailer. If you order other items with this decoration, it will ship separately from the rest of the order. As such, the shipping price on these decorations will not go down or combine if you order other items. The shipping fee for these decorations is a flat rate. All decoration orders will begin shipping out on 10/16. Anything else ordered will ship immediately. The decorations will ship via priority mail to get them to you as fast as possible!

name: GPK Poster Set
description:
All 4 8BZ GPK inspired posers - Limited Quantity! 
11" x 15.4" 
Shipped rolled in a poster tube.

name: Glowgo Tee
description:
The 8-bit ZOMBIE logo just got even radder - Now it glows in the dark! Sport this "glowgo" tee at night to ward off those  8-bit baddies.

Hand printed on black 100% cotton American Apparel tees.

name: Maurice
description:
Some friends can be real monsters. And some monsters can be real friends.

Hand printed on white 100% cotton American Apparel tees.

name: Battletoads
description:
Zombietoads!

The only thing harder than this tee is the game itself.

TOADILY AWESOME.

Printed on black 100% cotton American Apparel tees.

name: Tarman
description:
Your favorite slime covered barrel zombie is BACK! And boy is he hungry... 

Hand printed on 100% cotton American Apparel tees.

name: Beetlejuice Tee
description:
Let's turn on the juice and see what shakes loose!

Hand printed on black American Apparel tees.

name: They Live Shades
description: Shades similar to those ol' Rowdy Roddy wears to sneak a peek on those creeper aliens.

name: Auryn
description:
FALCOOOOOOOR!!!

Hand printed on all black trucker hats. The front features an embroidered Auryn pacth.

name: 8-bit Nightmare
description: Now you're playing with power - NIGHTMARE POWER!

name: LUNCHBOX
description:
8-bit ZOMBIE's 3rd lunchbox is here at last! Once again this bad boy is bursting with 80's radness. As with the previous lunchboxes, quantities are limited so DON'T MISS OUT!!! When these are gone, THEY ARE GONE FOR GOOD!

Lunchbox orders include a sticker pack and a "behind the scenes" collector card set that detail the background and origin of all 3 lunchboxes!

name: Noxious
description:
Just like Thrashor before him, Noxious is the 8-bit ZOMBIE take on yet another classic 80's toy line. 

Every tee ships with a Noxious file card for your collection!

Printed on 100% cotton black American Apparel tees.

name: ZOMBICON
description:
Our take on those radical transforming robots that we all love. What do you get when you mash up an NES cart, a skull and one of the most classic and awesome logos of the 80's? The ZOMBICONS!


Printed on black 100% cotton American Apparel tees.

name: Heroes
description:
The sequel to our VILLAINS tee, this design is chock-full of 80's childhood nostalgia. At 8-bit ZOMBIE, we don't grow up, we only get bigger!

Printed on 100% cotton white American Apparel tees.

name: 'Vania
description:
A tribute to a true NES classic and it's amazing box art. Whip it good.

Printed on "new silver" 100% cotton American Apparel tees.

name: Grayskull
description: YOU HAVE THE POWERRRRRRR!!! - On your head. This hat features a screen printed brim and an embroidered patch on the front!

name: RADiculous Shades
description:
These shades are RADiculous!

So 80's it hurts.

Available several colors!

name: 8BZ Arcade Token
description:
8-bit ZOMBIE Arcade Tokens are here! Don't get caught without a 1UP in the 8BZ arcade!

Just like true arcade tokens of the past, these bad boys are made of solid brass. They a bit bigger than a US quarter and feature the 8BZ logo on one side and some retro arcade action on the back. Individual tokens come packaged in a bag & topper. Get'em while they last!

<object width="200" height="150"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/RfkcI8dhfsQ?hl=en_US&version=3&rel=0"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/RfkcI8dhfsQ?hl=en_US&version=3&rel=0" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="200" height="150" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true"></embed></object>

name: LUCAS
description: Lucas, he's the ultimate NES badass. He had every game, and knew every move. And most importantly he had THE POWERGLOVE. This shirt is our homage to the height of the NES pop-culture insanity that was the movie 'The Wizard.' Not only is this movie the ultimate NES fest, it also spawned one of the greatest quotes of all time. Printed front & back on American Apparel.

name: THRASHOR
description:
No one on Eternia knows where THRASHOR came from or what side he is truly on. But rumor has it that Skeletor used his foul magic to bring THRASHOR back from the grave. Skeletor had planned on creating a powerful zombie that he alone could control but THRASHOR's will was stronger than Skeletor had anticipated. THRASHOR shattered Skeletor's controlling spell over him using his prized POWERGLOVE. Making a hasty escape on his skateboard, THRASHOR disappeared into the night and out of Skeletor's clutches for good. 
 
THRASHOR now roams Eternia in search of clues to who he was and how he died. Never truly living but not truly dead, this tortured soul finds solace only in skating. THRASHOR can sometimes be seen on dark and misty Eternian nights, skating by the glow of the moon...

Printed on white American Apparel tees.

name: Villains
description:
What do 80's cartoon villains do when they're not terrorizing the good guys?



Printed on black American Apparel tees.

name: Eternal Warriors
description:
The battle for Eternia never ends...

Printed on black 100% cotton American Apparel tees.

name: Mumm-Rad
description:
Ancient spirits of evil, transform this decayed form to MUMM-RAD, THE EVER-RADICALLLLLL!!!!

Printed on heather grey American Apparel tees.

name: Never Say Die
description:
Once a Goonie, always a Goonie - NEVER SAY DIE

Hand printed on army colored American Apparel tees.

name: Ghosts 'N Gobs
description:
A parody of classic video game box-art, this tee delivers on all levels.

Printed on black American Apparel tees.

name: EXCITE
description:
Classic NES action brought to life with with an 80's Motocross vibe.

Printed on white American Apparel tees.

name: YO JOE!
description: "G.I. Joe is the codename for America's daring, highly trained special mission force. It's purpose, to defend Human Freedom against Cobra, a ruthless terrorist organization determined to rule the world." Wear this tee while stompin' snakes! YO JOE!!!!

name: MEGA
description:
MEGA RAD 8-bit action!

Printed on royal blue American Apparel tees.

name: Pixel Shades
description: Pixelate your peepers with these 8-bit shades!

name: 80's Splatter Shades
description:
Classic 80's shades with clear fronts, a splatter/color gradient design on the arms and mirror lenses with a "rainbow" tint.

MEGA-RAD!!!

Color choices are:

Green/Blue Fade
Pink/Yellow Fade 
Purple/Pink Fade
Orange/Green Fade
Green/Yellow Fad

Shades also include stringer-thingers!

name: 80's Classic Shades
description:
The 80's classic. Black fronts with colored arms. These babies also have "rainbow" mirror lenses.

MEGA-RAD!!!

Color choice include:

Blue Arms
Green arms
Yellow Arms
Pink Arms
Black Arms

Shades also include stringer-thingers!

name: Bounty Hunter
description: Wear this hat while exploring Planet Zebes.

name: Punched Out!!
description:
King Hippo, one of the few opponents from Mike Tyson's Punch-Out that didn't make my hands sweat.

Pro Tip - Pop him in the mouth and he'll leave his belly unguarded and ripe for pummeling.

Printed on sea foam American Apparel.

name: The Adventures of Link
description:
Link's love of rupies was bound to get him into trouble. 

Printed on mint American Apparel tees.

name: Masters University
description:
If you want to save Eternia, you best get educated first.

Hand printed on heather grey American Apparel tees.

name: Power Patch
description:
Embroidered logo patches are here! Slap one on your Members Only jacket and let everyone at the arcade know you are a proud member of TEAM 8BZ! GET 8-BIT!

Patches are 3.5 inches and have an iron-on backing.

name: Hoffman
description:
They live. We sleep. But try on a pair of quality Hoffman brand sunglasses and see the world like you've never seen it before....

WAKE UP & RESIST

Hand printed on heather grey American Apparel.

name: NeverEnding
description:
Epic fantasy and neverending adventure await when you wear this tee. Ride a Luck Dragon, battle The Nothing and save Fantasia!

Hand printed on black 100% cotton American Apparel tees.

name: Revenge
description: Wear this Ninja Gaiden inspired hat forward and freak out your opponents with two sets of eyes. Wear it backwards and have eyes in the back of your head to watch for out for 8-bit enemies. Only Available in the regular sized hats. ------------------------------------ The "REGULAR" hats have the classic trucker hat fit. The foam front is a little taller and the hat is a little deeper than the "SMALL" hats. If you have a regular to large sized head, you might want to go with these. The "SMALL" hats are actually YOUTH SIZED hats. They are a little smaller and fit a little tighter. If you have a regular to small sized head you might want to go with these.

name: Contra
description: Grab a buddy and get ready to battle a horde of vicious aliens all the way back to their hive! Printed on a camo trucker so you can blend in with the jungle. Only available in the REGULAR size. ------------------------------------ The "REGULAR" hats have the classic trucker hat fit. The foam front is a little taller and the hat is a little deeper than the "SMALL" hats. If you have a regular to large sized head, you might want to go with these. The "SMALL" hats are actually YOUTH SIZED hats. They are a little smaller and fit a little tighter. If you have a regular to small sized head you might want to go with these.

name: Double Dragon
description: This hat is sure to get you in the mood for some classic side-scrolling beat'em-up action! Available in red & white or red/white/blue! Size regular only. ------------------------------------ The "REGULAR" hats have the classic trucker hat fit. The foam front is a little taller and the hat is a little deeper than the "SMALL" hats. If you have a regular to large sized head, you might want to go with these. The "SMALL" hats are actually YOUTH SIZED hats. They are a little smaller and fit a little tighter. If you have a regular to small sized head you might want to go with these.
